ygData.subject: RE: Symphonic Harmony reminder please
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Rokenn!  *hugs* Thanks Sylly!  *hugs* Hmm Rokenn is there a place for bard-only effects on your site? I have been watching EQLizer build their effect
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Rokenn! *hugs*

Thanks Sylly! *hugs*


Hmm Rokenn is there a place for bard-only effects on your site?

I have been watching EQLizer build their effect list with great interest.


Maravana



> It has the same effect as Song of Dawn. It lowers your position on the
> targets hate list.
>
> Rokenn


> Here is how it decodes by eqcaster:
>
> Symphonic Harmony
> Lowers you on the target's hate list by -100
> Sylly Songsynger
